name: akeyless-types-commons
description: Shared TypeScript types, interfaces, and enums used across Akeyless platform services and applications
story: akeyless-types-commons is a foundational shared library that centralises all domain-level TypeScript definitions for the Akeyless vehicle-tracking platform. It defines the canonical shapes for entities such as cars, clients, sites, users, equipment, boards, GPS events, socket communication, credit management, and feature-flag enumerations. By publishing these definitions as a standalone package, every consumer (server, client, mobile, toolbox) works from the same source of truth, eliminating type drift between services.
capabilities: Domain entity interfaces (Car, Client, Site, Board, Equipment, User)
Socket event contracts and Redis update payload types
